name: EFGChatMessageType
comment: This is the struct for the messages that are displayed in the chat

properties.name: ServerTimeStamp
properties.comment: Synchronized time stamp of when the message was sent

properties.name: Sender
properties.comment: The player who sent the message

name: AFGChatManager
comment: Manages the chat in the game.

methods.name: Get
methods.comment: Get the chat manager, this should always return something unless you call it really early.

methods.name: Get
methods.comment: Get the chat manager from a world context, this should always return something unless you call it really early.

methods.name: Multicast_BroadcastChatMessage
methods.comment: Broadcast a chat message to all clients

methods.name: AddChatMessageToReceived
methods.comment: Helper function to add a chat message to the local array

properties.name: OnChatMessageAdded
properties.comment: Called when you get a new local message

properties.name: mMaxNumMessagesInHistory
properties.comment: How many messages will we save in the chat history

properties.name: mMessageVisibleDuration
properties.comment: How long a message will stay fresh and visible without opening the chat

properties.name: mReceivedMessages
properties.comment: An array of all the messages that the local player have received.
